\haddockmoduleheading{Tweethelpers}
\label{module:Tweethelpers}
\haddockbeginheader
{\haddockverb\begin{verbatim}
module Tweethelpers (
    mkCrossValScheme,  stopWords,  filterByLabel, 
    Tweet(Tweet, tLabel, tUser, tDate, tTime, tMessage)
  ) where\end{verbatim}}
\haddockendheader

\begin{haddockdesc}
\item[
mkCrossValScheme\ ::\ Eq\ a\ =>\ {\char 91}Vector\ a{\char 93}\ ->\ {\char 91}(Vector\ a,\ Vector\ a){\char 93}
]
\item[
stopWords\ ::\ {\char 91}String{\char 93}
]
\item[
filterByLabel\ ::\ Vector\ Tweet\ ->\ String\ ->\ Vector\ Tweet
]
\end{haddockdesc}
\begin{haddockdesc}
\item[\begin{tabular}{@{}l}
data\ Tweet
\end{tabular}]\haddockbegindoc
\haddockbeginconstrs
\haddockdecltt{=} & \haddockdecltt{Tweet} & \\
                    \haddockdecltt{tLabel :: String} &
                    \haddockdecltt{tUser :: String} &
                    \haddockdecltt{tDate :: String} &
                    \haddockdecltt{tTime :: String} &
                    \haddockdecltt{tMessage :: String} &
\end{tabulary}\par
\end{haddockdesc}
\begin{haddockdesc}
\item[\begin{tabular}{@{}l}
instance\ Eq\ Tweet\\instance\ Ord\ Tweet\\instance\ Show\ Tweet\\instance\ FromRecord\ Tweet
\end{tabular}]
\end{haddockdesc}
